description: This file defines an ErrorBoundary React component used for catching JavaScript errors in component trees and rendering a fallback UI.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: React component that acts as an error boundary, catching errors in child components and rendering a fallback UI with error information and a reload button.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: React lifecycle method that updates state when an error is caught.

methods.name: componentDidCatch
methods.description: React lifecycle method that logs error information when an error occurs.

methods.name: handleReload
methods.description: Method to reload the current webpage when invoked.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders either the fallback UI with error details or the child components.
